configs.name: QUIK
configs.additionalSettings: {"apkFilterRegEx":"release","invertAPKFilter":false,"about":"QUIK is an open source replacement for the stock messaging app on Android. It is a continuation of QKSMS."}

description.en: QUIK is an open source replacement for the stock messaging app on Android. It is a continuation of QKSMS. Only finds release versions and skips debug releases.
